Job/Team Function: The Finance Group develops financial strategy, systems, processes, reporting and accounting, and is at the heart of the decision making across FCO Services. It also leads on information assurance, business planning and provides first class finance business partnering service across the organisation.

Job Title: Technical Services Director and Deputy Director Client Delivery
Job/Team Function: The Technical Services Centre provides a flexible multi-skilled pool of specialists delivering construction, IT and security projects in a commercial, customer-facing structure. It is supported by a Business Management Office operating at OGC best practice levels and a Centre of Technical Expertise that provides engineering and technical solutions.

Major projects manages the delivery of a programme of corporate projects aimed at enhancing business capability and efficiency through the development of appropriate infrastructure, processes and the corporate portfolio of businesses.

The Operations Group delivers ongoing contracts to customers, including the maintenance of IT, technical and physical security in FCO missions and property management both in the UK and overseas. �It also offers secure infrastructures, servers and data centre expertise to support and host systems.

Name: Chris Moxey
Job/Team Function: The Chief Executive has overall responsibility for the management of FCO Services. As Accounting Officer, he is personally responsible and accountable to Parliament for ensuring proper use of public money and stewardship of its assets. The Head of Procurement reports to the Chief Executive, and the Office leads on corporate governance, business continuity, health and safety policy and communications.

The Services and Logistics Group provides a range of secure logistics worldwide for the FCO and other UK government departments. Services include air, road and sea freight transportation of classified and unclassified mail and worldwide courier services supported by a UK-based regional distribution centre. It also provides highly secure disposals, national security vetting and translation and interpreting services to a range of customers. �

Client Delivery manages the delivery of multiple, project-based programmes for our customers. These include installations, ICT projects and the project management of secure construction projects. This role also leads the Technical Services Centre.

The HR Group leads on the development of FCO Services People Strategy, which is designed to meet the needs of the business and help it deliver key objectives. It also leads on IiP accreditation, and provides commercially focused employment policies and transactional HR services for the business in line with best practice and the Civil Service framework.

The Commercial Group is responsible for developing business strategy, marketing and sales of FCO Services' products and services. It also leads on the business improvement programme, developing customer relationships, quality management and business performance monitoring.
